alert.note: Alert for Nowata; Osage; Rogers; Washington (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 28 at 12:26AM CDT until June 28 at 1:15AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tulsa has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Rogers County in northeastern Oklahoma... Northeastern Osage County in northeastern Oklahoma... Washington County in northeastern Oklahoma... Nowata County in northeastern Oklahoma... * Until 115 AM CDT. * At 1226 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Elgin to 4 miles west of Bigheart to 7 miles northeast of Fairfax, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations in or near the path include... Bartlesville... Nowata... Pawhuska... Dewey... Barnsdall... Oologah... South Coffeyville... Copan... Ramona... Wynona... Ochelata... Delaware... Avant... Lenapah... Talala... Vera... Wann... Bigheart... Bartlesville Municipal Airport... Osage Hills State Park... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
